channel.title: How do I change XP and drop rate?
channel.description: I am using the JointScape source and was wondering how to change the rates? thanks alot :)

item.title: How do I change XP and drop rate?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“ZachAlai, post:5, topic:265425”]Ok i am here and I see this, double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(700hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(700hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(250hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;

what do I do once im here?[/quote]
You change the 700, 300, and 250 to the rates you want them to be.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change XP and drop rate?

item.title: How do I change XP and drop rate?
item.dc:creator: @OwnageDBOW OwnageDBOW
item.description:
@OwnageDBOW wrote:

For the drops rate go to NPCDrops.CFG and you should see stuff like

//Bat npcdrop = 78 526 1 100

This means the bat drops bones 100% of the time. Lets say you wanted him to drop a Bronze war hammer 10% of the time you would do this

//bat npcdrop = 78 526 1 100 npcdrop = 78 1337 1 10

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change XP and drop rate?

item.title: How do I change XP and drop rate?
item.dc:creator: @ZachAlai ZachAlai
item.description:
@ZachAlai wrote:

Ok i am here and I see this, double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(700hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(700hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(250hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;

what do I do once im here?

Read full topic

For changing the xp rate, search for ‘exprate’ in your client class. As for changing the ‘drop rate’, I don’t really have a clue as to what you mean.
